channel.title: Wondering?
channel.description:
well my cousin got a psp and i wanted to ask is it possibile still to get roms of other games onto it? and how and if you can even get psp games? (like downloading and burning somehow or what?)
Please and thanks/
Frost21

item.title: Wondering?
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

You can have it degraded, and sometimes even if you just bought a PSP, it might be old stock, meaning a older version.

Read full topic

item.title: Wondering?

item.description:
@system wrote:

oh,thats what i was wondering… i guess i cant do it for my cousin since he has the newer one, he just got it a week ago.

item.title: Wondering?
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

You don’t need a mod chip, all you need is the older version of PSP, like 1.5. That allows you to play burnt games from your memory stick.

Im not sure if anyone has stated this, but I didn’t feel the need to read this whole thread, sorry if Im spamming.

Read full topic

item.title: Wondering?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I did fucking google it but didnt find anything to help , because I know you were able to get emulators and roms before, but i heard they changed it so now you couldnt the newer ones…

Edit: also paulT could you please specify where they tell you how to get the downloads to your psp?

Read full topic

item.title: Wondering?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Answer: Yes.

use something called a mod chip...cost like 80 australian dollars but lets you play burnt games. i got one winksmile so much cheaper...to play games

You don’t need that.

well seeing as how you have to have a special program to download music pictures and videos onto a psp it would eb impossible to put games onto it..... though someone might could buy a psp and hook it to their computer with a usb cable and play psp games on their computer.... though I dont know... I hate my psp it's a waste of time.

Wrong.

I’m surprised you bought something that you don’t understand.

Set up your PSP by downloading st00f:
http://dl.qj.net/

And next time just fucking google it.

Read full topic
